meanings.sent1: The old car was crudded with mud after the off-road adventure.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen sink was crudded with leftover food scraps.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked funny all crudded up with glitter from the craft project.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt crudded with worries, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house was crudded with cobwebs, giving it a spooky appearance.

meanings.definition: Formed into a crust or layer of dirt or other unwanted substances
meanings.sent1: The neglected pool had a crudded surface that needed cleaning.
meanings.sent2: The crudded paint on the walls made the room look unkempt.
meanings.sent3: The crudded-up sidewalk resembled a chocolate bar left out in the sun.
meanings.sent4: His crudded thoughts were like a barrier preventing new ideas from entering.
meanings.sent5: The crudded layer of dust on the bookshelf made it hard to see the titles clearly.
